Tech Valley Digital Gaming Hub

2017 | Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute

Worked with Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute's Games and Simulation Arts and Sciences department to design/develop a custom WordPress theme and plugins for the school's Digital Gaming Hub. The site's main goal is to encourage students and businesses to create new innovative technologies in the Capital Region.

Sneaky Spanish

2015 | School Project

Sneaky Spanish is a Chrome Extension that allows you to learn Spanish in the context of web pages you are already reading on the web by selectively translating words and passages on the pages you view.
